posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Tough-grading SGC has assigned this card a rating of 86 (NM+). They don’t come much better than this - only one SGC George Gore N172 card is graded higher. So the story goes, this card was pulled directly from an Old Judge pack by the previous owner. $1200 or I'll use it to trade for a HOFer I need to upgrade.

[IMG]http://members.aol.com/kkkkandp/gore.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Nice 1887 version - $350 SOLD
